title: How to Make Cola Chicken Pasta

steps.headline: Prepare to make the chicken.
steps.description: Preheat the oven to 350° Fahrenheit (175° Celsius). Get out a 9 x 13 inch baking dish and season it with salt and pepper.

text: Prepare to make the chicken. Preheat the oven to 350° Fahrenheit (175° Celsius). Get out a 9 x 13 inch baking dish and season it with salt and pepper. Boil the dry penne pasta into a pot with the water. Follow your pasta's instructed directions to know how long to cook the pasta. It usually takes about 7-8 minutes for it to fully cook. Drain the pasta and set aside. Add the cola sauce onto the chicken. In a medium-sized bowl, stir the Worcestershire sauce, ketchup, and cola. Place the chicken breasts into the baking tray and pour the cola sauce all over it. Bake the chicken for about 50 minutes, until the chicken fully cooks and is not pink. While you wait, prepare the pasta. Prepare the penne pasta. Sprinkle the oil on a medium-sized saucepan. Saute the garlic, sun-dried tomatoes, and parsley for about one minute. Stir in the pepper flakes and the black pepper. Add in the penne pasta and mix to combine in the ingredients. Add extra olive oil if needed. Shut the stove off. Remove the cola chicken from the oven and have it cool for about 7-10 minutes, until warm and easy to handle.  Serve. Using a wooden spoon, scoop a desired amount of pasta on a serving plate. Add the cola chicken. Enjoy!
